svg.text: Panel (a): Parameter Sensitivity Lens Fraction: -2.1 ps (dominant) QED Field: +1.4 ps
Panel (b): Parameter Importance Lens Fraction: 100% importance All others: <1% each
Panel (c): Uncertainty Budget QED Field: 1.4 ps (largest) Lens Design: 0.7 ps
Panel (d): Optimization Optimal lens fraction â‰ˆ 0.5 Clear experimental roadmap
ANALYSIS: Lens fraction dominates (100%), Clear optimization at 0.5
